alert.note: Alert for Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 2:27PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL CALHOUN...SOUTH CENTRAL VICTORIA AND NORTHEASTERN REFUGIO COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM CST... At 227 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Quintana, or 7 miles east of Refugio, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... McFaddin, Quintana, and Tivoli. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 596 and 618. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
